head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Manhattan: Police Department Starts Video Podcasts

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Manhattan: Police Department Starts Video Podcasts

block.p: The Police Department has begun a monthly series of video podcasts offering an inside look at the department, Police Commissioner Raymond W. Kelly announced yesterday. The videos will be available for download through the iTunes service to iPod users and can also be viewed online at the Police Department's Web site, nyc.gov/html/nypd/home.html. The first episode features a six-minute look at the department's harbor and scuba units.
